Name: Knight's Retreat
About the game: A chess game without any chess. Rearrange your troops to bring your best Knights back to your Kingdom in an abstract medieval world. Featuring: 80 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity. A fun chess puzzle now available to everyone (even to those who never played chess) Beautiful, abstract world inspired by Medieval Times; Originally composed music to help you focus and relax while solving the puzzles
